榽字的基本解释

榽
xī
〔榽橀（
x?）〕古书上说的类似檀木的一种树。

榽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》胡鷄切，平齊，匣。］
见“榽橀”。

榽字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榽； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页545第13
【唐韻】胡雞切【集韻】【類篇】弦雞切，?音兮。【爾雅·釋木】魄，榽橀。【註】木細，葉似檀。今江東有之。齊諺曰：上山斫檀，榽橀先殫。　又【集韻】胡計切，音係。【說文】束也。　又【廣韻】戸佳切，音㥟。榽棱也。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋木】魄榽橀。【註】木細，葉似檀。今河東有之。〕　謹照原文河改江。
榽字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
榽字的起名意思

古书上说的类似檀木的一种树，如榽橀。

榽
Basic explanation of words
榽
xī
〔榽橀(
x?)] A tree similar to sandalwood in ancient books.
榽
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" chicken cut, flush, box. ]
See "榽橀".
榽
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榽; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 545 13
[Tang Yun] Hu Ji cut [Ji Yun] [Classes] Xian Ji cut, sound Xi. 【Erya·Shimu】Pan, sluggish. [Note] The wood is thin and the leaves are like sandalwood. Today Jiangdong has it. Qi Yan said: Go up the mountain to pour the sandalwood, and then go to the first place.　[Jiyun] Hu Jiqie, phonology. [Said the text] Shu also.　[Guangyun] To Jiaqie, sound 㥟. Luling also. Textual research: [[Erya·Shimu] Po Lulu. [Note] The wood is thin and the leaves are like sandalwood. Today Hedong has it. 〕 　 I would like to change the river according to the original.
榽

榽

сущ. * си (также 榽橀 сиси, сихай порода дерева)
